title: Contact Motor Carrier Services
text_content:
Contact Information
Motor Carrier Customer Service
Phone: (804) 249-5140, option 3
TTY: 711 or (800) 828-1120 (Virginia Relay)
Virginia Department of Motor Vehicles
Motor Carrier Services
P. O. Box 27412
Richmond, VA 23269
Hauling Permits (excluding 5% overload permits)
www.ezhaulvirginia.com
Email:
haulingpermit@dmv.virginia.gov
Phone: (804) 786-2787
Citation Tracking
Email:
citationtracking@dmv.virginia.gov
Phone: (804) 249-5140, option 1
Payments: (804) 249-5140, option 4
Commercial Intrastate Compliance and Operations (CICO)
Email:
mcsonline@dmv.virginia.gov
Phone: (804) 249-5140, option 2
EZ Fleet
Email:
ezfleetsupport@dmv.virginia.gov
IRP Customers:
iftairp@dmv.virginia.gov
Phone: (804) 249-5140, option 5
EZReg
Email:
ezregsupport@dmv.virginia.gov
Phone: (804) 249-5140, option 6
VirginiaMCS
https://virginiamcs.com
Email:
VirginiaMCSHelp@dmv.virginia.gov
Phone: (804) 249-5140, option 1
International Fuel Tax Agreement (IFTA)
Email:
iftairp@dmv.virginia.gov
Phone: (804) 249-5140, option 1
Payments: (804) 249-5140, option 4
International Registration Plan (IRP)
Email:
iftairp@dmv.virginia.gov
Phone: (804) 249-5140, option 1
Payments: (804) 249-5140, option 4
Driver Alert
Email:
driveralert@dmv.virginia.gov
Phone: (804) 497-7155
See all
motor carrier programs
.
Need something else? Contact
DMV customer service
.
